    public static class FundamentalModel.EpipolarResidual
extends AbstractResidualCalculator<Point2d,Point2d,FundamentalModel>
    Geometric residual that sums the distance of points from the closest epipolar line.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
